snippet.title: Johnny Depp Reveals How He Fell in Love with Amber Heard: 'She Was in My Head'
snippet.description:
When Johnny Depp met his wife, Amber Heard, for the first time, he knew they had something special. 

The couple, who just celebrated their one-year wedding anniversary, met on the set of 2011's The Rum Diary. And while there were definitely sparks between them while filming, Depp says it wasn't until after they parted ways that he realized how strong his feelings for her really were. 

"She was in my head, so I tracked her down," Depp, 52, said onstage at the 31st annual Santa Barbara International Film Festival on Thursday, where he was presented with the Maltin Modern Master Award for his accomplishments in the film industry.
tags: When Johnny Depp met his wife
